title: Both Iran and UK legislatures oversee budget

content.prompt: Which of the following most accurately compares the national legislatures of Iran and the United Kingdom?

choices.label: In both countries, the legislatures approve legislation and oversee the budget.
In both countries, each legislature has an upper and lower house.
In both countries, laws passed by the legislatures cannot be overturned.
In both countries, there are no restrictions as to who can run for the legislature.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
